name: Vangardia
description:
Vangardia is a metroidvania inspired, and deriving from, the fanmade ROM hack Chrono Trigger: Crimson Echoes, also known as Flames of Eternity. The plot follows a knight named Glenn, who seeks to thwart the hordes of necromantic undead pouring in from a mysterious castle near a defenseless village.

This game reuses assets from the aforementioned ROM hack in an attempt for legitimacy, including sprites, and tracks composed by the talented Claado Shou, in addition to composer Alex Roe from the former Chrono Crisis and Chrono Ark teams. Topping it off are the voice performances of DesertPogona and Yuka Tominaga!

The video below shows an alpha build with player stat boosts for debugging purposes, and should not be judged as the final build.
